phrases: A Guy You Like, or a Guy from the Past?
But as expected, that song was the best.
It was awesome hearing it live.
I am still totally worked up!
I lived near you when we were in elementary school.
He is a boy but his name is Haruka-chan.
You guys are teasing Haruka again?
I am taller than you now.
I have got to get going.
It sure does bring back memories!
Which school are you going to now, Risa?
Oh, so you are going there.
I have not seen you for a while.
How are things going with your ex-girlfriend these days?
The guy that suddenly hugged you in the middle of the street.
He is a childhood friend of mine.
He moved overseas when we were in the fifth grade.
You are the one who is always saying ex this, and ex that.
Please bless me with a boyfriend this year.
Hey, something is coming out of you.
Is this the girl you went to the Christmas concert with?
Sorry to cause all that trouble a few days back.
I did not realize that Atsushi-kun was seeing someone already.
There is absolutely nothing going on between me and Otani!
There is no love between us at all.
So if there is something you want to tell Otani,
I will do everything I can to support you!
I do not know exactly what happened between you two, but I will support
What the hell did you say just now?!
This is important to you, is not it?!
It is none of your business!
I did not choose him because of his height!
It is just that the person I liked happened to be tall.
I do not dislike Atsushi-kun because he is short.
Later when I thought about it, I realized it looked like I would done something awful.
But even so, I felt really awkward about explaining it to you.
I am a little confused now, but...
It was good to get it off my chest.
You can hit me, kick me, do whatever you want to me.
I had no idea that was what she wanted to say.
I though she wanted to get back together with you.
It was really none of my business.
Thanks to you, I heard what she had to say.
To tell the truth, I was holding onto a bit of hope,
I am just saying that, though.
Hey, want to go get some lunch?
In the end, the boyfriend/girlfriend challenge did not go anywhere.
When I finally realized that, it was already Valentines Day.
Cookies are much easier to make.
Say, why do not we make those cookies?
I asked you to join us, did not I?
I have no one to give cookies to, even if I do make them.
You have Otani, do not you?
Why should I give cookies to Otani?!
He ended up with his feelings hurt again because of your mistake,
It is a good idea, huh?
It is their album from when they were with an indie label.
I found it at a second-hand music store.
This is a discontinued release, so it is hard to find now.
They get along well, do not they.
They are both so carried away that they could totally get together right now.
Hey, do you want chocolate cake or cookies for Valentines Day?
Are you going to make something yourself?
Risa's going to be helping us out, too.
You are talking about that again?
Who would fall victim to such a thing?
What do you mean fall victim to?!
If any guy eats chocolate made by this amazon, he will get sick.
And he will probably grow huge to boot.
No one would be happy to receive chocolate made by a huge girl like me.
I have never even been on a date.
I do not have any fans who think I am cute, either.
I will probably never give out any chocolate until the day I die!
Why are you always acting so strangely?
You can give me your chocolate.
I do not want you to accept it half-heartedly out of pity.
It is okay if you would rather not give it to me, though.
I-I-I never said I would make anything for you!
We always see you and Otani-kun together.
Otani-kun would not date a huge girl like that, after all.
Those girls will be giving Otani chocolate too, will not they?
If he is going to receive so much chocolate, he probably will not need mine.
It is so nice to see you again!
Why did that guy come to our school yesterday?
He came to complete his student-transfer paperwork.
He is your type, right Koizumi?
He used to be a hopeless crybaby.
His grandma's British, so he used to look just like a foreign girl.
He may be good looking now, but...
I should have said he was my ex-boyfriend!
I thought I was about to lose to you,
Anyway, you do not have any plans today, right?
Let us go to the CD store and look for some more Umibouzu CD's.
Risa, this chocolate cake looks really easy to make.
I would better have my stomach pills ready.
I came to pick you up.
If you are free, let us have tea together.
I have already made plans with Otani today.
What on earth is this little creature?!
Now that I think of it, Risa,
Do not talk about me like I am a pet!
You are not fit to be seen with a beauty like Risa.
There must be something wrong with his head.
This guy keeps getting on my nerves!
Is this the guy you just told me you had plans with?
It is totally uncool for you to be seen with a midget like him!
You have been my hero for a long time now.
I hope that you will always be as cool as you were back then.
Even if I kill you, God will forgive me for it!
I will not let you have her!
Do not say something so unreasonable!
Haruka is not really a bad guy.
This is the first time I have ever come across such a mean guy.
Do not get me involved in such an unreasonable situation.
Haruka said that stuff out of nowhere!
A man who needs a woman's protection is just pathetic.
It is even more pathetic for a man to be that short.
I made you a lunch box.
Do not go barging into other people's classrooms!
You are not a student here yet!
You are quite a noisy midget, are not you?
A midget should act like a midget.
Now be quiet and stay out of sight.
Look, we have captured an alien!
I am going to kill you!
You would better get going now!
Otani, who was that guy just now?
Those two look pretty good together.
They are both tall like models.
Come to think of it, Koizumi-san is really pretty, is not she?
But she looks like one half of All Hanshin-Kyoujin when she is with Otani.
You guys are going to say the same thing he did?!
Is it my fault that Koizumi's so freaking tall?!
It does kind of seem that way.
Your cake looks really nice, Risa-chan.
Do I seriously have to give this to Otani?
Otani is already super mad at me because of Haruka.
I wonder if Haruka-kun likes you, Risa-chan...
That guy only sees me as his hero.
A hero is normally a man, right?
I do not look very feminine, do I?
But he said you were beautiful.
If you were more serious about it, you would probably be really popular.
How am I supposed to be more serious?
Take part in girly activities from time to time, like a girl, for example.
Something is coming out of your body.
How come you say you do not want it now?
You are making me feel stupid!
Day does not mean anything to me, but you said you wanted this!
I only said if you had nobody to give your chocolate to, you could give it to me!
That is why I am giving this to you.
You have that annoying Haruka now, do not you?
Oh, Koizumi is giving chocolate to Otani!
Y-You have got it all wrong!
It is a CD I wanted to borrow, right?
It is for her childhood friend, right?
So that is how it is.
I am giving this to Haruka.
I came to pick you up again today.
I was actually hoping to receive Valentine's chocolates from you.
You do not need to thank me.
I will treasure it my entire life!
You would better eat it quickly, otherwise it will go bad!
But I kept the chocolates you gave me before.
Want to hang out with me for a bit?
Ahh, I feel much better now!
You are still so good when it comes to games.
You are cool no matter what you do.
Hearing that does not make me happy at all.
That is what I like most about you, Risa.
You are the only one who would say a thing like that.
Everyone is always calling me All Hanshin-Kyojin at school.
That is because you have always got that midget hanging around you.
What is your relationship with that guy, anyway?
It is not like we have a relationship, as such.
We are just in the same class, and walk home the same way.
You are wasting your time hanging around with him.
You say that, but he actually has a lot of good qualities.
He trains really hard at basketball, even though he is short.
And whenever I am in trouble, he always come to my rescue.
A-Anyway, he is not a bad guy.
No matter what happens, I will not lose to that midget.
I always dreamed that you would one day be my girlfriend,
One of these days I will declare my love for you, and ask you to be my girlfriend.
Please think about how you will answer me.
It was only obligatory chocolate, anyway.
The era of short guys is coming!
